ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Digest Number 101
ygData.msgSnippet: rumors abounded back long ago that player made plate was available, but you needed folded sheets of metal.  I recently saw a listing for folded sheets of metal
ygData.messageBody:
rumors abounded back long ago that player made plate was available, but you
needed folded sheets of metal. I recently saw a listing for folded sheets
of metal somewhere, but could not relocate it after I made the connection
and realized what I had seen. Maybe give this a try.

-----Original Message-----
From: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com [mailto:EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com]
Sent: Tuesday, March 14, 2000 5:31 AM
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Digest Number 101

Message: 1
Date: Mon, 13 Mar 2000 23:13:12 -0000
From: "Joseph Kish" <kraeken@...>
Subject: hello?

Is there anyone still on this list?

I've heard rumors of forged armor being in the game and am wondering
if anyone knows anything about it...

Thanks
